subject: Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Track and field's new generation of star athletes, who are trying to resuscitate the reputation of their sport after years of battering by drug scandals, are blood-tested regularly, at major competitions and at random.
snippet: Track and field's new generation of star athletes, who are trying to resuscitate the reputation of their sport after years of battering by drug scandals, are blood-tested regularly, at major competitions and at random.
